data.title: Gender justice in Europe – Page 8
data.meta_description: Posts about Gender justice in Europe written by wideplusnetwork
data.text:
Este seminario en línea hace parte de una serie de dos Webinars que estarán disponibles en inglés y español FECHAS : 15 de julio 2020 14.00 - 15.30 (CET) => registrarse aquí En estos seminarios en línea se compartirán experiencias…

Read More Webinar “COVID-19: Mujeres migrantes en Europa resisten ante el aumento de abusos y precariedad II”, 15 July 14.00 CET

In the past week, on 15 and 16 April 2020, Poland’s Parliament decided to debate two draft bills that would severely limit access to safe abortion care and would criminalize the provision of sexuality education. If enacted into law these…

Read More WIDE+ joins international solidarity to fight for pushback on abortion and sex education in Poland
